price: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a severe punishment.
arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
